data.name: Magneto
data.description: A master of magnetic fields who can shift enemy positions and empower his Brotherhood allies.

starItems.name: Magneto
starItems.description: A master of magnetic fields who can shift enemy positions and empower his Brotherhood allies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>. if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies, prolong all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>. if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies, prolong all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Remove <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>+10%</color> Piercing
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Remove all positive effects
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + clear all positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

7.description:
Pull all enemies up to <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces toward the primary target, then attack primary and targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Counterattacked.

1.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> or <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally. On enemy Crit, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies:
 > Fill Speed Bar by an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> for self.
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self, <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus for self, <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> or <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally. On enemy Crit, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies:
 > Fill Speed Bar by an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> for self.
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Crit, always apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self, <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus for self, <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> and <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> or <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally.
